data.title: Magadan, Russia
data.meta_description: Magadan, Russia - Current temperature and weather conditions. Detailed hourly weather forecast for today - including weather conditions, temperature, pressure, humidity, precipitation, dewpoint, wind, visibility, and UV index data.
data.text:
Weather forecast and temperature for today - Sunday, 01. Sep

04:53

19:00

+10

Rain / Wind

14°C / 9°C

Wind: 52km/h ENE

Humidity: 89%

Precip. probability: 99%

Precipitation: 33mm

UV index: 2

Today, in Magadan, windy and rainy weather is anticipated.

Intense precipitation of 33mm (1.3") is expected. A subtle difference will be noticeable between the daytime peak temperature of a refreshing 14°C (57.2°F) and the nighttime low of a chilly 9°C (48.2°F).

Today, the predicted high temperature is set to match the regular peak temperature in August.

Sunrise was at 04:53 and sunset will be at 19:00; the daylight will last for 14h and 7min.

In Magadan, at the moment, the weather is mainly cloudy.

The temperature is a fresh 11°C (51.8°F), and the real-feel temperature is appraised at a chilly 8°C (46.4°F). The current temperature is only a few degrees off the highest temperature for today.

Frequently asked questions

What is the current temperature?

Currently (05:04) it is 11°C (51.8°F) in Magadan. Feels-like temperature is 8°C (46.4°F).

What is the weather forecast for Magadan for today?

Today, in Magadan, rainy and windy weather is expected.

Will it rain today?

Yes, it will rain today in Magadan, Russia. Be wary - intense precipitation of 33mm (1.3") is predicted.

What will be the highest temperature today in Magadan?

Today, the highest temperature will be 14°C (57.2°F), while the lowest temperature will be 9°C (48.2°F).

Today, the highest temperature will be in line with the average maximum temperature in August. The lowest temperature today will be also in line with the average low temperature.

When are sunrise and sunset today?

On Sunday, in Magadan, sunrise was at 04:53 and sunset will be at 19:00 (+10).

How many hours of daylight will Magadan have today?

In Magadan, today, there will be 14h and 7min of daylight.
